content.raw: Right, I wonder if there's a way of unchecking the special Gazebo markers (collisions, joints, CoM etc.) with one event that fires upon entering the model editor. You would probably want to save the settings before entering the model editor and then re-check the saved settings once the model editor is exited. Sounds like it's probably meant for a different PR though.
content.html: Right, I wonder if there's a way of unchecking the special Gazebo markers (collisions, joints, CoM etc.) with one event that fires upon entering the model editor.
